Text: Welcome again, how are you going?
Ough (coughs) I`m sorry I`m not very well. Go to  the tent if you want to busy some armor or weapons.
King Sancho told me that you brought us the sampleof Arechinix. Thanks!
If you are looking for a golden mask go to the    Northlands. The boat will take you to the main    city - Bravendell, then go north trough the woods and hills. Beware the orcs and goblins!
Well, now the mask is yours. Wear it with proud.  Go speak with king Sancho, he will tell you when  we are leaving to fight with the corona plague!

Whoa! This is it! The Original Golden Mask.       Yep it has the FPP3 certificate! Give it to me and I`will make you suitable for you!
